meanings.definition: A type of cereal made from wheat that has been parboiled, dried, and cracked.
meanings.sent1: I cooked some bulgurs for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The bulgurs added a nutty flavor to the salad.
meanings.sent3: The bulgurs in the soup were so happy to be swimming together.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like bulgurs in a pot.
meanings.sent5: The bulgurs danced in the boiling water, ready to be eaten.
